subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Wright says he is “pretty impatient” with the Mets’ off-season plans, one piece of which fell into place with the announcement that outfielder Chris Young had signed a $7.25 million deal.
snippet: David Wright says he is “pretty impatient” with the Mets’ off-season plans, one piece of which fell into place with the announcement that outfielder Chris Young had signed a $7.25 million deal.
